purpose: Facilitates quick deployment and management of AI agents locally and remotely.
principle: Provides a user-friendly interface to set up and manage AI agents, leveraging MCP (Multi-Channel Protocol) for exposure.
reusability: Offers an MCP Server for integrating and managing agents and tools, allowing for easy extensibility and customization.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited features and potential stability issues.
name: shinkai-apps
description: Shinkai is a two click install AI manager (Local and Remote) that allows you to create AI agents in 5 minutes or less using a simple UI.  Agents and tools are exposed as an MCP Server.
highlight: Two-click install AI manager for rapid creation of AI agents with a simple UI.
